basics.name: Norberto Carosella
basics.label: Experienced Frontend Developer with over 9 years of experience in Web Development
basics.summary: Highly motivated Front-End Developer with 9+ years of experience building user-centric web applications. Leveraging expertise in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, I create engaging and dynamic user interfaces that bridge the gap between user needs and code. Proven ability to deliver high-quality applications across diverse industries (AgTech, Crypto, Travel).  A quick learner and problem-solver, I can seamlessly integrate into new teams and hit the ground running.

work.name: BeMap
work.summary: Bemap is a Japanese company that integrates mobile features and systems, offering development for railways, Wi-Fi, security cameras, TV data, and websites.
highlights:
Developed a brand-new application using Angular 16 and TypeScript, ensuring successful on-time delivery.
Played a key role in securing new business partnerships by creating impactful Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) in Angular 16.
Collaborated closely with backend developer and designer to deliver the frontend of a successful client project.
